name: How many days can you survive?
name_original: How many days can you survive?
description:
This is a ROGUELIKE SURVIVAL game where you start in a randomly generated map, with enemies and food, everytime you move, you lose food, collect food to regenerate food counter, avoid enemies as they deal damage to you every second, break blocks to open way, and make it to the exit, USE your moves wisely, as the days progress, enemies start to move faster, they start to deal more damage, foods start to offer less, play as much as you can and as strategical as possible to see HOW MANY DAYS CAN YOU SURVIVE. 

Art Credit: Unity Asset store ROGUELIKE 2D pack

Game Idea Credit: Unity

To be clear, this game is from a unity tutorial game, i took the art and idea, cause its free to use and made my version of it, in python for fun, i changed the enemy movement, and made it so as days go by it gets harder to live. Thanks for Unity for this awesome idea and art of a game!
